title: Алоэ Вера
description: Thrives in bright, indirect light. Avoid overwatering.

title: Антуриум
description: Prefers dry conditions. Needs minimal care.

title: Каланхоэ
description: Succulent plant. Let soil dry between watering.

title: Каланхоэ.png
description: Loves humidity. Keep soil consistently moist.

title: Монстера
description: Tolerates low light. Allow topsoil to dry.

title: Орхидея
description: Prefers indirect light and high humidity. Keep soil moist.

title: Сансевиерия
description: Tolerant of low light. Allow soil to dry completely between waterings.

title: Спатифиллум
description: Requires indirect light and high humidity. Water when roots appear silvery.

title: Фикус
description: Enjoys bright, indirect light. Keep soil slightly moist.
